import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import styles from './BottomBar.module.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faChevronDown, faChevronUp, faPlus } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import CourseNavItem from './CourseNavItem/CourseNavItem' export default function BottomBar() { const { selectedPlanID } = useContext(PlansContext) const [dropdownOpen, setDropdownOpen] = useState(false) return (
Design-build 4: Autonomous devices for controlling and studying living systems
{dropdownOpen ? ( ) : ( )}
) }
